channel.title: [FIX] Change aspect Ratio issue
channel.description:
Some users couldn't change the aspect ratio(me too) I've found an easy fix, using steam launch option.
Fix
1- Right click on Black Mesa, then click on Properties.
2 - Click on Set launch option.. button
3- write -w <width> -h <height>
[url='https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=1040-JWMT-2947']click here[/url] for steam explanation
You can find the resolution of your screen in control panel->screen or using your GPU software
